src_original: navadaśaḥ paricchedaḥ //  anyo 'pi puṇyavṛddhaye hetuḥ kāryaḥ /  yo 'yaṃ sarvâvasthāsu satvârthaḥ //  yathā kathitaṃ câryaratnameghe /  sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 又於如來塔廟，或於如來像前，以華香塗香布施供養，當願一切有情蠲除破戒穢惡之香，普願一切有情獲得戒香清淨。

src_original: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 』又於所止若開戶時，即起是念：

src_original: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /

tgt_original: 『當願一切有情悉作如是右脇涅槃。

src_original: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /

tgt_original: 『當願一切有情超出煩惱淤泥。

src_original: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /

tgt_original: 『當願一切有情獲得大人所行所止。

src_original: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /

tgt_original: 『當願一切有情滌除煩惱垢染過失。

src_original: sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /

tgt_original: 『當願一切有情蠲除煩惱穢氣。

src_original: sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām anekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /  sarvasatvānāṃ sarvadharmamukhāni pariśodhayeyaṃ /

tgt_original: 『當願一切有情除去種種煩惱塵坌。 』若嚼齒木時，即起是念：

src_original: sa sanmārjanôpalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasatvānām aprāsādikêryāpathavigamāya /  prāsādikêryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 又若掃塔塗地之時，當願一切有情離諸惡相，獲得相好端嚴具善威儀。

src_original: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 又以華蓋供養佛時，當願一切有情離諸煩惱燒然。

src_original: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
